extendedInfo.description: Just Another random soundboard?? NO! Here's the first customizable soundboard on the market and it's free! Add any button you want by just tapping the green "Add New" button. Not only you can create a new button from any sound file in your phone, you also have the option to search for any sound online!!!You can also edit or remove any button by just long-tapping it! Isn't that just cool?Tap buttons to hear your favourite sounds, troll some friends, take the fun with you all the time!! You can set any sound as Notification/Alarm/RingtoneBy default, it will inculde dozens of famous memes sounds from internet (such as ComboBreaker, Falcon Punch, Khaan, Rimshot, This is Sparta, Nyan, Chuck Testa o Mudkip) lines from your favourite series (like Big Bang Theory, How i met your mother, Community, Futurama, South Park, American Dad, Lost, Adventure Time or The Simpsons), video-games buttons (like PacMan, Age Of Empires, Metal Gear, Metal Slug, Star Fox, Unreal, Counter Strike, Skyrim, Minecraft, League Of Legends, Street Fighter, Diabloâ¦) quotes from movies (Harry Potter, Terminator, Saw, Kill Bill, Batman, Rocky...), just every sound you need to have some fun!!!Search through the pack store and find packs of Napoleon Dynamite, Mortal Kombat, etc! You may find one or two fart packs soon as well :P The annoying Orange, Bananero, Achmed the dead terrorist, Gangnam Style, LMFAO, SuperBad, Obama, Charlie Sheen, The Simpsons and more!Packs out there:Pineapple ExpressSuperbadObamaAnnoying OrangeSimpsons(LAT)Charlie SheenNapoleon Dynamite FartsBananero(LAT)Mortal Kombat 4I'll keep adding all sorts of packs (for free of course.. )Feel free to suggest any pack at v.flores90.vf@gmail.comThis app is supported via search. Please note that the following will be added to your device once you download the app â Search icon, bookmark link and browser homepage. You can delete/replace these search points easily. This is a way to make money from this app and giving it to you for free. Thank you for your understanding.Stay in tune for updates!

reviews.title: Awesome range of sounds!
reviews.comment: It\'ll be nice if you could favourite sound clips so it\'ll be easier to gain access to the sounds you want. More convenient that way.
reviews.author: Casandra Chia

reviews.title: Lot\'s of Sounds - I Like
reviews.comment: You can even make your own from a sound file from your phone. Nice

reviews.title: Suggestion
reviews.comment: Add more sounds to the standard pack like from freak sound effects by jaun javier.add more and ill give you 2 more stars.

reviews.title: Fun to play with.
reviews.comment: I wish I could move buttons into the order and categories I want them, but other then that, it\'s just what I was looking for.

reviews.title: Kool
reviews.comment: I really like the buttons cause I can use them in many different situations if my lil bro tells a bad joke I use crickets if no one is laughing then all laugh not at him but with him cause its funny if they ask my wat I\'m doing and they see I\'m reading my book I\'ll go 2 button soundboard and put I\'m fire in my lazar or if they r about 2 fight I put western and they laugh

reviews.title: Good/Not Good
reviews.comment: Yes the sounds are all good, but I wanted to play them all and after playing about 9 of them they stop playing.  I had to keep exiting and going back to the app again.  Fix it and I will score you higher.
